name: Instant Contact – Generate leads and convert them into Customers
author: Faisal Mughal

sections.description:
Instant Contact lets you add a contact form to your WordPress blog. Simply load it into your plugins folder, activate it in your WordPress backend and place any shortcode / embedded code on the settings page you want the content / form to display on.

Compatible with:

  • Contact Form 7
  • Gravity Forms
  • Contact Coldform
  • Quick Contact Form
  • Responsive Contact Form
  • Simple Basic Contact Form and many more…
  • Any embedded code
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Instant Contact screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
What can I display in the Instant Contact?

It can parse any WP shortcode, and third party scripts.
